"The EU specifications for certificates involving booster vaccinations have changed. This certificate does not match the current specifications. While the vaccination certificate remains valid, the booster vaccination may not be identified during checks. Therefore, please request the issue of a new vaccination certificate.\n\nYou can request a new vaccination certificate directly and free of charge in the app. Your consent is required for this."
